top_comments.comment: These little guys surely never get bored, they must have the time of their life in those mazes^^ Great theme and amazing attention to detail, love it :D

My hamster ( before she died a few days ago) hated hamster mazes lol. The lil hamsters look nice and healthy :) keep up the good work :) but maybe next time don’t use the spinning box thing hamsters easily get dizzy.
MoistCrital is Ruining your Squid Game Video hope You Respond to Him!

comments_since_last_sample.body: I love that u create this cool and cute mazes for your hamsters. They must be having the time if their lives😎😜. I am also really curious on how you create all of your cool mazes
I love When they kissed at the end

My hamster ( before she died a few days ago) hated hamster mazes lol. The lil hamsters look nice and healthy :) keep up the good work :) but maybe next time don’t use the spinning box thing hamsters easily get dizzy.
